boolean.label_en: Convert the attached documents to this artifact

comment.label_en: Leave this option unchecked to update the properties of the attached documents without changing them to the same artifact as the parent virtual document.

combo.assistance_dql: select object_name from cd_auto_inherit_config where any object_types = '$value(r_object_type)' and any automatic_events = 'Reclassify' and enabled = true order by precedence, object_name

comment.label_en: Check this option to keep the existing document values where they are left blank in the parent virtual document properties â€“ otherwise they will be reset to blank values.

The property changes will be applied to a new minor version initially, so they can be verified. When the reclassification is approved, the changes will then be applied to all prior versions, including prior Effective/Approved versions. Note that Group, Subgroup, and Artifact will not be modified on prior versions.
